props.name: xs
props.description: The number of columns to span for extra-small screen sizes. Setting the prop to true will set the width automatically

props.name: sm
props.description: The number of columns to span for small screen sizes. Setting the prop to true will set the width automatically

props.name: md
props.description: The number of columns to span for medium screen sizes. Setting the prop to true will set the width automatically

props.name: lg
props.description: The number of columns to span for large screen sizes. Setting the prop to true will set the width automatically

props.name: xl
props.description: The number of columns to span for extra-large screen sizes. Setting the prop to true will set the width automatically

props.name: xxl
props.description: The number of columns to span for extra-extra-large screen sizes. Setting the prop to true will set the width automatically

props.name: first
props.description: Display the column as the first column

props.name: first-xs
props.description: Display the column as the first column on extra-small screens

props.name: first-sm
props.description: Display the column as the first column on small screens

props.name: first-md
props.description: Display the column as the first column on medium screens

props.name: first-lg
props.description: Display the column as the first column on large screens

props.name: first-xl
props.description: Display the column as the first column on extra-large screens

props.name: first-xxl
props.description: Display the column as the first column on extra-extra-large screens

props.name: last
props.description: Display the column as the last column

props.name: last-xs
props.description: Display the column as the last column on extra-small screens

props.name: last-sm
props.description: Display the column as the last column on small screens

props.name: last-md
props.description: Display the column as the last column on medium screens

props.name: last-lg
props.description: Display the column as the last column on large screens

props.name: last-xl
props.description: Display the column as the last column on extra-large screens

props.name: last-xxl
props.description: Display the column as the last column on extra-extra-large screens

props.name: offset
props.description: The number of columns to offset the column by

props.name: offset-xs
props.description: The number of columns to offset the column by on extra-small screens

props.name: offset-sm
props.description: The number of columns to offset the column by on small screens

props.name: offset-md
props.description: The number of columns to offset the column by on medium screens

props.name: offset-lg
props.description: The number of columns to offset the column by on large screens

props.name: offset-xl
props.description: The number of columns to offset the column by on extra-large screens

props.name: offset-xxl
props.description: The number of columns to offset the column by on extra-extra-large screens

props.name: push
props.description: The number of columns to push the column by

props.name: push-xs
props.description: The number of columns to push the column by on extra-small screens

props.name: push-sm
props.description: The number of columns to push the column by on small screens

props.name: push-md
props.description: The number of columns to push the column by on medium screens

props.name: push-lg
props.description: The number of columns to push the column by on large screens

props.name: push-xl
props.description: The number of columns to push the column by on extra-large screens

props.name: push-xxl
props.description: The number of columns to push the column by on extra-extra-large screens

props.name: pull
props.description: The number of columns to pull the column by

props.name: pull-xs
props.description: The number of columns to pull the column by on extra-small screens

props.name: pull-sm
props.description: The number of columns to pull the column by on small screens

props.name: pull-md
props.description: The number of columns to pull the column by on medium screens

props.name: pull-lg
props.description: The number of columns to pull the column by on large screens

props.name: pull-xl
props.description: The number of columns to pull the column by on extra-large screens

props.name: pull-xxl
props.description: The number of columns to pull the column by on extra-extra-large screens
